pages.text: Wa Qala Fir`awnu Dharuni 'Aqtul Musa Wa Liad`u Rabbahu 'Inni 'Akhafu 'An Yubaddila Dinakum 'Aw 'An Yuzhira Fi Al-'Ari Al-Fasada
Wa Qala Musa 'Inni `Udhtu Birabbi Wa Rabbikum Min Kulli Mutakabbirin La Yu'uminu Biyawmi Al-Hisabi

Wa Qala Rajulun Mu'uminun Min 'Ali Fir`awna Yaktumu 'Imanahu 'Ataqtuluna Rajulaan 'An Yaqula Rabbiya Allahu Wa Qad Ja'akum Bil-Bayyinati Min Rabbikum Wa 'In Yaku Kadhibaan Fa`alayhi Kadhibuhu Wa 'In Yaku Sadiqaan Yusibkum Ba`u Al-Ladhi Ya`idukum 'Inna Allaha La Yahdi Man Huwa Musrifun Kadhabun
Ya Qawmi Lakumu Al-Mulku Al-Yawma Zahirina Fi Al-'Ari Faman Yansuruna Min Ba'si Allahi 'In Ja'ana Qala Fir`awnu Ma 'Urikum 'Illa Ma 'Ara Wa Ma 'Ahdikum 'Illa Sabila Ar-Rashadi
Wa Qala Al-Ladhi 'Amana Ya Qawmi 'Inni 'Akhafu `Alaykum Mithla Yawmi Al-'Ahzabi
Mithla Da'bi Qawmi Nuhin Wa `Adin Wa Thamuda Wa Al-Ladhina Min Ba`dihim Wa Ma Allahu Yuridu Zulmaan Lil`ibadi
Yawma Tuwalluna Mudbirina Ma Lakum Mina Allahi Min `Asimin Wa Man Yulili Allahu Fama Lahu Min Hadin
